name: Token Tool by Bitbond
highlight: Create, manage and distribute tokens effortlessly on Avalanche
summary: Token Tool by Bitbond enables users to effortlessly configure, launch and manage smart contracts for various tokens across leading EVM chains (Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche, BNB Chain). Features include minting/burning, managing contract ownership. multisend, creating liquidity pools and more. Token Tool offers wallet connectivity for Metamask, Wallet Connect, Coinbase Wallet and Ledger.
